seriesJson.title: The legendary pianists
seriesJson.description: Music by great early-twentieth century concert pianists who produced Duo-Art piano roll recordings before advent of electronic recording.

node.title: Chopin
node.description: This program presents Alfred Cortot performing works by Chopin.

node.title: Schumann, Beethoven
node.description: This program presents Ignaz Friedman performing works by Schumann and Beethoven.

node.title: Glazounov, Scriabin, Miaskowsky
node.description: This program presents Sergey Prokofiev performing works by Glazounov, Scriabin, Miaskowsky, Rimsky-Korsakov and himself.

node.title: Schumann, Brahms, Albeniz, Debussy
node.description: This program presents Artur Rubinstein performing works by Schumann, Brahms, Albeniz and Debussy.

node.title: Schubert, Chopin, Liszt
node.description: This program presents Ignace Paderewski performing works by Schubert, Chopin and Liszt.

node.title: Dvorsky, Hofmann, Chopin
node.description: This program presents Josef Hofmann performing works by Dvorsky, Hofmann and Chopin.

node.title: Schubert, Chopin, Rachmaninoff
node.description: This program presents Ossip Gabrilowitsch performing works by Schubert, Chopin, Rachmaninoff, Sapellnikoff and himself.

node.title: Rachmaninoff, Saint-Saens, Tchaikov
node.description: This program presents Vladimir Horowitz performing works by Rachmaninoff, Saint-Saens, Tchaikovsky and Schubert.

node.title: Chopin
node.description: This program presents Harold Bauer performing works by Chopin.

node.title: Schubert, Henselt, Sgambatti
node.description: This program presents Aurelio Giorni performing works by Schubert, Henselt, Sgambatti and Rubinstein.

node.title: Chopin and Liszt
node.description: This program presents Ferruccio Busoni performing works by Chopin and Liszt.

node.title: Rubinstein, Chopin, Henselt
node.description: This program presents Leopold Godowski performing works by Rubinstein, Chopin, Henselt and Schumann.

node.title: D'Indy, Faure, Franck
node.description: This program presents Robert Lortal playing works by D'Indy, Faure and Franck.

node.title: Schumann
node.description: This program presents E. Robert Schmitz playing Schumann's Carnival, Op. 9.

node.title: Chopin, Albeniz, Debussy, Brahms
node.description: Artur Rubinstein performs works by Chopin, Albeniz, Debussy and Brahms.

node.title: Beethoven, Chopin, Liszt
node.description: This program features Ignace Paderewski in a "pops" concert, including Beethoven's Moonlight Sonata, Chopin's Military Polonaise, and a Liszt Hungarian Rhapsody.

node.title: Chopin
node.description: Harold Bauer in an all Chopin recital.

node.title: Grieg
node.description: Percy Grainger in a performance of Grieg's concerto.

node.title: Paderewski, Scharwenka, Granados
node.description: Ignace Paderewski, Scharwenka, Enrique Granados and George Gershwin playing their own works.

node.title: Schumann and Chopin
node.description: Josef Hofmann performs works by Schumann and Chopin.

node.title: Schubert, Pierne, Scott, Casella
node.description: A program of two-piano recitals by Harold Bauer & Ossip Gabrilowitsch, Harold Bauer & Myra Hess, Harold Bauer & Percy Grainger, in works by Schubert, Pierne, Cyril Scott, Casella and Arensky.

node.title: Bach and Saint-Saens
node.description: Harold Bauer performs works by Bach and Saint-Saens.

node.title: Rachmaninoff, Mendelssohn, Liszt
node.description: Josef Hofmann performs works by Rachmaninoff, Mendelssohn and Liszt.

node.title: Chopin by Ignace Paderewski
node.description: Chopin recital by Ignace Paderewski
